name: Good360
description: Donated technology and goods including laptops, monitors, tablets, and office supplies; availability varies by donor shipments
fullDescription: Good360 is a nonprofit organization that partners with major retailers and manufacturers to distribute donated goods to nonprofits and schools, including technology equipment.
whatTheyOffer:
- Donated technology including laptops, monitors, tablets
- Office supplies and equipment
- Various retail goods and merchandise
- Availability varies based on donor shipments
howToGetIt:
1. Register your nonprofit organization at good360.org
2. Complete the membership application
3. Pay annual membership fee (varies by organization size)
4. Browse available products in the online catalog
5. Request items and arrange shipping/pickup
keywords: Good360, nonprofit donation, donated technology, laptops, tablets, monitors, office equipment, 501c3, charity, donated goods
